attributes.action: Rename Manchester Airport, the Sir Bobby Charlton Airport (Manchester)
attributes.additional_details:
All around the world Sir Bobby Charlton was synonymous with Manchester. His football career is unequaled in England - winning league championships, FA cup, European cup and the World Cup. 
A Munich air disaster survivor, who never forgot the teammates & others who lost their lives in 1958.
A footballing legend, with a humble nature, a combination that made him a hero all around the world. 
It is time for Manchester to celebrate with the world what Sir Bobby brought to the city.
attributes.background:
All around the world Sir Bobby Charlton was synonymous with Manchester.  
So rename Manchester’s airport after the great man.
